thinking: The ally base should train a worker. There are no other units, so no attack is needed yet. No harvest needed since there are no workers yet.

The game requires assigning one worker to harvest and all other units to attack. The base should train new workers if possible. Since this is turn 10, I should have a worker assigned to harvesting and the base should train if it has resources. All other units should attack.
Prioritize aggression after securing 1 harvester. Only one worker should harvest every turn. All other units should attack the enemy as fast as possible. Base keeps training new workers.

The priority is to have one worker harvesting resources. The other worker should attack the enemy. The base should keep training workers if possible. Since there is only one worker, let it harvest, and the base should train a worker.

Based on the strategy, I need to assign one worker to harvest resources, all other units must attack the enemy. The base should keep training new workers if resources are available. Since I have one worker and one base, the worker should harvest and the base should train a worker.

The ally base should train a worker if resources allow. One worker should harvest resources. All other units should attack the closest enemy unit.
